Translation: I'm going to Korea next year.
Japanese: 来年は韓国に行く予定です
Spanish: Me voy a Corea el año que viene.

Japanese: 一人で行かないでください

Sentence: 내일 현우 씨 생일 파티에 가는 사람 있어요?
Reading: naeil hyun see sangel patie ganeun saram isseoyo
Translation: Is there anyone going to Hyunwoo's birthday party tomorrow?
Japanese: 明日のヒョヌさんの誕生日パーティーに行く人いますか
Spanish: ¿Alguien va a ir mañana a la fiesta de cumpleaños de Hyunwoo?

Translation: Do you know how to get there?
Japanese: そこへの行き方を知っていますか

Sentence: 지하철 말고 버스 타고 가고 싶어요
Reading: jihacheol malgo bus tago gago sipeoyo
Translation: I want to take the bus, not of the subway.
Japanese: 地下鉄ではなくバスで行きたいです
Spanish: Quiero coger el autobús en vez del metro.

Japanese: また次回も来たいです
Spanish: Estoy deseando volver la próxima vez.

Sentence: 그저께 효진 씨랑 같이 왔던 사람 누구예요?
Reading: geujeokke hyojin ssirang gati wassdeon saram nuguyo
Translation: Who is that person who came with Hyojin the day before yesterday?
Japanese: 昨日、ヒョジンさんと一緒に来た人は誰ですか
Spanish: ¿Quién es la persona que vino con Hyo-jin el otro día?

Sentence: 경은 씨가 언제 올지는 아무도 몰라요
Reading: gyeongeun ssiga eonje oljineun amudo mollayo
Translation: Nobody knows when Kyeong-eun will come.
Japanese: キョンウンさんがいつ来るかは誰にも分かりません
Spanish: Nadie sabe cuándo llegará el Sr. Kyung-Eun.

Japanese: 彼女と一緒に来てください
